scripts.build-scheme: cp -rf src/script/dinkdonk-scheme/dinkdonk-scheme.js build/ && node tools/replace-in-file.js build/dinkdonk-scheme.js INJECT_CSS node_modules/dinkdonk-scheme/ace/dinkdonk.css
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && npm run build-scheme && npm run build-ts && npm run build-templates && npm run build-scss && npm run move-assets
scripts.serve: node node_modules/browser-sync/bin/browser-sync.js start --server 'build' --files 'build' & npm run watch-ts & npm run watch-scss
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add -f build && git commit -m 'Deploy to gh-pages' && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix build`:gh-pages --force && git checkout master && git branch -D gh-pages
